Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.util

Interface IComparer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Comparer
public interface IComparer
Utilities for comparing item and fluid stacks.

    • isEqual

      boolean isEqual(@Nonnull net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack left, @Nonnull net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack right, int flags)
      Compares two stacks by the given flags.
      Parameters:
      left - the left stack
      right - the right stack
      flags - the flags to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the left and right stack are the same, false otherwise
